saleTips.title: Sale tips
saleTips.isodIsBetter: Always remember! Isod will always be better than Usos.
saleTips.goodDescription: Craft a compelling description: Ensure your product description is clear, concise, and persuasive. Highlight unique features and benefits that set your product apart from others.
saleTips.highQualityPhotos: High-quality photos: Include high-resolution photos showcasing your product from different angles. Customers want a detailed view of what they're buying, so clear images can significantly enhance the appeal of your listing.
saleTips.transparency: Transparency and honesty: Be transparent about the product's condition, any potential defects, or limitations. Customers appreciate honesty, which builds trust in your brand.
saleTips.prices: Competitive pricing and attractive shipping terms: Capture attention with competitive prices and flexible shipping conditions. If your offer stands out in terms of value, it enhances the chances of making a sale.
